page.title: 09FINZEAN WRI 1985.
page.content: {Finzean WRI,}founded in 1931, held its meetings in the Soup Kitchen of the school ,now the Outdoor Centre, and members walked or cycled to attend. Today members travel by car to the monthly meeting in the comfort of Finzean Hall. Membership (33) is less than in the 50's but interest is still keen and recently Finzean Institute has won trophies and prizes at both Group and Federation levels for{bulb-growing, {baking and handicrafts. We have a speaker or demonstrator at our meetings and one meeting per session is given over to a Charity. We also have{whist drives, birthday {and Christmas parties and an annual {outing.
